revised_title: Description of a Monstrous Child Born in Heisagger, South Jutland
tldr: This article describes the birth of a monstrous child in Heisagger, South Jutland, with various physical abnormalities, including an old-looking face, extra toes, and a long tail. The child died shortly after birth, and the author, Christopher Krahe, provides a detailed account of its appearance and the circumstances surrounding its birth.
